35% OFF on PickMe Food up to Rs.1,050/- for Credit Cards with a minimum order value of Rs.3,000/- and up to Rs.525/- for Debit Cards with a minimum order value of Rs.1,500/-

This offer is valid for only one transaction per cardholder on the offer day.
If any dispute arises regarding any of the terms and conditions contained herewith, the decision of PickMe and BOC Bank shall be final.
The offer cannot be exchanged for cash and/or used in conjunction with any other promotional programs or offers provided by PickMe
*Conditions apply.
